fig_2d <- d_reg_EstNumber_noise_summary_200317 %>%
  group_by(run) %>%
  summarise(mean = mean(mean_beta3), se = std.error(mean_beta3)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = run, y = mean, color = run)) +
  geom_point(size = 2) +
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = mean - se, ymax = mean + se), width = 0.1) +
  geom_hline(aes(yintercept = 0), color = \black\"
